title: Region Transfer, now cant play games
body:
Hey guys,

I have just transferred my account back to OCE from NA (wow the trolls there are bad... so big plus to OCE guys. We are much better than NA, even in bronze). However, I now cannot play any games. I started with a 20 min timer saying I left matches, then got a 1 hour timer and then got another 1 hour timer. I havent even had a chance to play a game yet!!!!

Any help?

replies.body: Wow, 15 hours, and still no reply from RIOT... really...?
And I am going to bed now. 6 hours, still cant play. Riot I demand reimbursement.
whats more, is it was working fine in NA, then I have PAID to NOT be able to play.
Is that Leavebuster telling you? It was recently implemented and it's really glitchy.
Yeah its the leaver buster. I paid 2600 RP to transfer, and havent been able to play a game for 6 hours now.

It's almost like they didn't beta test Leavebuster.

I feel really sorry for you, you didn't even do anything and it's punishing you.
